name: libimobiledevice
description: A cross-platform software protocol library and tools to communicate with iOSÂ® devices natively.
author: Norman Paniagua (https://github.com/norman784)

scripts.clone: yarn clean:tmp && mkdir tmp && yarn clone:openssl && yarn clone:libplist && yarn clone:libusbmuxd && yarn clone:libimobiledevice
scripts.make: yarn clean:dependencies && mkdir $npm_package_config_install_dir && yarn make:openssl && yarn make:libplist && yarn make:libusbmuxd && yarn make:libimobiledevice && yarn clean:tmp
scripts.make:openssl: export INSTALL_PATH=$PWD/$npm_package_config_install_dir && cd tmp/$npm_package_config_openssl_dir && ./Configure --prefix=$INSTALL_PATH --openssldir=$INSTALL_PATH/openssl darwin64-x86_64-cc && make && make install_sw
scripts.make:libimobiledevice: export INSTALL_PATH=$PWD/$npm_package_config_install_dir && export npm_package_config_pkg_dir=$INSTALL_PATH/lib/pkgconfig && export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=$INSTALL_PATH/lib/pkgconfig && export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="${INSTALL_PATH}/lib:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}" && export CPATH="${INSTALL_PATH}/include/openssl:${CPATH}" && cd tmp/$npm_package_config_libimobiledevice_dir && ./autogen.sh && ./configure --prefix=$INSTALL_PATH && make && make install
scripts.make:generic: export INSTALL_PATH=$PWD/$npm_package_config_install_dir && cd tmp/$npm_package_config_library_dir && ./autogen.sh && ./configure --prefix=$INSTALL_PATH && make && make install
